Name: Survive in Angaria
About the game: Survive in Angaria is a mini RPG survival game... Talk with people, check tunnels and kill zombies! You have to Survive in Angaria ! Features Mini RPG Survival game! You can loot items! Craft new weapons! Manage the basic farm system! Buy new weapons and armors! Fight with zombies! You can fish! Turn Based Combat System! Look around, chose your weapon, earn money and help people!
